Row.Text: Our people are now reading your Nobel Prize-winning literature and listening to your romantic compositions. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

In honour of our brave soldiers, the Australian and New Zealand Army Corps, we commemorate their service to this nation and her allies by signing into law a national holiday marking a day upon which we pay respect to their sacrifices.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be New Zealand [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Modern Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities with a Military garrison gain +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All units with the 'ANZAC' promotion gain 10 XP

In honour of our brave soldiers, the Australian and New Zealand Army Corps, we commemorate their service to this nation and her allies by signing into law a national holiday marking a day upon which we pay respect to their sacrifices.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities with a Military garrison gain +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All units with the 'ANZAC' promotion gain 10 XP

It is in our blood to rule; our forefathers were imperialists, and so we should be, too. Let us then establish an imperial realm with which to carve a place of strength for us on the international stage.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be New Zealand [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Units gain a 33% bonus vs cities [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost is equal to the cost of your next Social Policy[ENDCOLOR]

It is in our blood to rule; our forefathers were imperialists, and so we should be, too. Let us then establish an imperial realm with which to carve a place of strength for us on the international stage.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Units gain a 33% bonus vs cities

An international committe has recently voted to declare {1_CityName} a world heritage site, because of its environmental significance. Such a status will surely bring in many new tourists to our visit our country.[NEWLINE]
Excellent. Charge them exorbitant rates to see it!
We have decided to monetize the World Heritage status bestown upon one of our cities.
Wonderful. We must cherish this site for future generations.
We have decided to protect the World Heritage status bestown upon one of our cities.
An international committe has declared the New Zealand city of {1_CityName} to be a World Heritage Site.

The independent paper 'Southern Cross' has reported of the sudden declaration of war between the {2_CivName} and the {1_CivName}. With {3_CivName} a stern ally of ours, the paper has reported that it can only be too long before {4_CivName} seeks an invasion by sea of New Zealand.[NEWLINE]
We must bolster the defense of our coasts!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free {2_UnitName} for each coastal city in the empire[ENDCOLOR]
We have dismissed the claim of an impending naval invasion as a hoax.
This is clearly a hoax. What nonsense.
In light of news of an impending invasion by sea, we have paid to bolster the coastal defenses of New Zealand.
